articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: Bharti Telecom acquires 3.33% Airtel stake from Singtel in $1.61 billion deal - Economic Times
articles.description: The Singapore companys effective holding in Bharti Airtel will drop to 29.7% from 31.4%. Its reduced holding in Airtel will include a 19.2% (up from 17.5%) indirect stake through BTL and a 10.5% ( down from 13.9%) direct stake.
articles.content: Singapore Telecommunications Ltd, commonly known as Singtel, will sell a 3.33% stake in Bharti Airtel to Bharti Telecom Ltd (BTL), a key promoter company of the the Indian telco, for $1.61 billion (R… [+4741 chars]

articles.title: American Express Welcomes RBI Move To Lift Restrictions In Key Market - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Per the RBI norms, financial services companies like Visa, Mastercard, American Express and Diners Club have been required to store Indian payment data locally since October 2018.

articles.title: Meesho hits a rough patch with down round concerns - The Morning Context
articles.description: The Bengaluru-based e-commerce startup is stuck between rapidly scaling the business and wanting a better valuation.
